package.name: Doofinder_Doofinder
package.summary: This extension allows to generate the data feed file required to use the Doofinder search service.
package.description:
Doofinder is an on-site search service that provides fast and accurate results based on your website content.
This free extension allows you to populate the data feed file required to use the Doofinder search service for each store view in a URL.
The data feed publish only public information of your products.
The Doofinder service is not free but it has a 30 day trial period. You can create an account visiting the Doofinder site at:
http://www.doofinder.com
package.notes: Fixed categories for the use of facets in the 4.0 version of Doofinder. + Added new controller for the future configuration wizard from the Doofinder admin pane.
